thread.section_title: Widerøe omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Widerøe | www.wideroe.no
thread.title: Nathalie

author: Nathalie
title: Nathalie
text:
I have been flying Widerøe for many years (great airline!), and am very satisfied with their service. That also goes for those times when I had to change a booking. As far as I know it isn't possible to call them, but they have a chat-service, which works well.
The only thing that has been annoying on a number of occasions is that Widerøe sometimes changes its already posted flight schedule.
